amendment.description: To increase funding for the Department of Education's English Literacy-Civics Education State Grant program, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4350 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 2. Record Vote Number: 57.

action.text: Amendment SA 4350 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S2050-2051; text: CR S2050) To increase funding for the Department of Education's English Literacy-Civics Education State Grant program, with an offset.
